text: Exactly what you should expect when it's made by the Chinese #BridgeCollapse pic.twitter.com/ID9yMr7IsT
@MelanieWebbSA is right; people DIED in that #BridgeCollapse ... and all we can do is argue about race?!  So upsetting.
So the #BridgeCollapse is a tragedy cause it's Murray & Roberts but it would've been black incompetence if it was a BEE company? Okay.
